peril.views.slick.board

Class SlickCountry

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.board.SlickCountry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public final class SlickCountry
extends Clickable
implements java.util.Observer
    The visual representation of a ModelCountry which observes an aggregated ModelCountry and is updated when the model version is.
    Since:
    2018-02-19
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, James_Rowntree
    See Also:
    Clickable, Observer, ModelCountry

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Point armyOffset
      The Point offset from the centre of the this SlickCountry that the ModelArmy will be displayed at.
      private SlickHazard hazard
      Holds the SlickHazard that has most recently occurred on the SlickCountry.
      private Clickable hazardIcon
      Holds the Clickable icon of the SlickHazard that has most recently occurred on the SlickCountry.
      ModelCountry model
      The ModelCountry that this SlickCountry displays.
      private SlickModelView view
      The SlickModelView that is used to map the ModelCountry to SlickCountry.
